desc: Official site of Margot Elena indie brands: TokyoMilk, Lollia, Library of Flowers, The Cottage Greenhouse, Love & Toast. Known for "Making Beauty More Beautiful," Margot Elena's meticulously crafted brand libraries overflow with luxuries beautifully balanced in design, fragrance and formulation.

layout.text: A   R   C   H   I   V   E
